2020-10-27.original_text: Ecolab Inc (ECL) Q3 2020 Earnings Call Transcript Analyst Report: Ecolab Inc. Ecolab (ECL) Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates in Q3 Ecolab (ECL) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates Ecolab Third Quarter Reported Diluted Continuing Operations EPS $0.85; Adjusted Diluted Continuing Operations EPS $1.15, -24%; Results Show Significant Improvement From Second Quarter
